text: So manga rurushik a manga Babai na pantag o manga rurushik a manga Mama, go so manga rurushik a manga Mama na pantag o manga rurushik a manga Babai, na so manga Soti a manga Babai na pantag o manga Soti a manga Mama, go so manga Soti a manga Mama a pantag o manga Soti a manga Babai: Siran man na di masosogat o Katharo iran (a kabokhag): Adun a bagiyan niran a Ma-ap, go Pagupur a mapiya
